channel.title: CiTR -- Planet Lovetron (2007)
channel.description: One part classic electronics. One part plunderphonicmixnmatch. Two parts new and experimental techno. One part progressive hip-hop. Mix and add informative banter and news for taste. Let stand. Serve, and enjoy. planetlovetron@gmail.com
channel.itunes:summary: One part classic electronics. One part plunderphonicmixnmatch. Two parts new and experimental techno. One part progressive hip-hop. Mix and add informative banter and news for taste. Let stand. Serve, and enjoy. planetlovetron@gmail.com
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: One part classic electronics. One part plunderphonicmixnmatch.
